WebLink.description: Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-016762 Projected Dates are calculated in order of Project Priority for all Projects that are assigned to the “Business Systems” team, have at least one related Task, and have a Status of either “Backlog Item” or “In Progress”. The projected dates utilize each Sprint’s “Daily Velocity” to determine how many project hours can be completed on a daily basis (based on work days only). The “project hours” for each Project is the “Project-Level LOE (hrs)” if the Status is “Backlog Item”, or the “Remaining LOE (Project)” if the Status is “In Progress”.
